skins.shipDescription: Second ship of Furutaka-class heavy cruisers, Kako.
skins.selfIntroduction: Second ship of the Furutaka-class heavy cruisers, Kako! I was perhaps the first real heavy cruiser made for my country. Despite contributing to the first Battle of the Solomon Sea, I took too many risks and ended up being sunk by a submarine... My personality? I'm only like this when I'm around you. Open your eyes and learn the advantages of a real heavy cruiser!
skins.acquisition: Second ship of the Furutaka-class, Kako, ready for orders. Why don't you show me whether you're worthy or not.
skins.login: Good timing, I just finished sorting your documents. Can you actually finish these?
skins.details: If you want to say something, just give it to me straight!
skins.secretaryIdle1: This fleet is quite impressive, except for their commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: You made a mistake here. And here. Do I have to tell you how to do everything?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I wonder how Aoba is doing right now...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Why you little... Hello? Could I speak with the Military Police?

skins.shipDescription: Performance upgraded, improvements complete. This way I can finally... *cough* Oh, it's nothing, Commander. I must simply be more strict with you in the future. Are you ready for your psychological examination?
skins.acquisition: Performance upgraded, improvements complete. This way I can finally... *cough* Oh, it's nothing, Commander. I must simply be more strict with you in the future. Are you ready for your psychological examination?
skins.details: What do you want? Surely you didn't come to get lectured.
skins.secretaryIdle1: This is a step up from before, but you still messed up here. Are you doing this on purpose to get me angry?
skins.secretaryIdle2: What am I writing? Your agenda, of course. Without it, you'd just slide right back to your old habits.
skins.secretaryTouch: I'll be here any time you have questions.
